sentences.sContent: If an entry is only sparsely filled in, the results may look more like Figure 8.
sentences.sContent_eng: If an entry is only sparsely filled in, the results may look more like Figure 8.
sentences.sCn: 如果一个条目只填充了稀疏的内容，那么结果看上去就像图 8 那样。

sentences.sContent: Instead, user mail files are sparsely distributed across a subset of servers within the cluster.
sentences.sContent_eng: Instead, user mail files are sparsely distributed across a subset of servers within the cluster.
sentences.sCn: 相反地，用户邮件文件稀疏地分布在集群内的部分服务器中。

sentences.sContent: A carpet of deep green covers most of the rugged landscape, but patches of bare or sparsely vegetated ground occur around the fringes of this image.
sentences.sContent_eng: A carpet of deep green covers most of the rugged landscape, but patches of bare or sparsely vegetated ground occur around the fringes of this image.
sentences.sCn: 一片深绿色的地毯覆盖了大部分崎岖的地表，而片片裸地或植被稀疏的地块散布于图片边缘。
